name: OctoPush - The game
description:
Octopush - The game was a project done for my COMP3000 Final year project. This game is based on the real-world sport, underwater hockey, and aims to replicate the game mechanics in an arcade, top-down 2d video game. Compete in the minigames to hone your skills and Improve your high score  with these unique game mechanics.

This is version  1.0.0 with several updates planned for the future.

Roadmap:

1.0.1 - Small bug fixes and adding the ability to pause mid-game

1.1.0 - Introduction of flicking

1.2.0 - More minigames

2.0.0 - multiplayer 1v1 / 2v2

Please read my EULA before downloading my game.
